knimeNode.name: FastqcStatisticMerger
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node can be used to merge statistics of FastQC modules.

fullDescription.intro: FastQC outputs statistics for each of its modules. This node can be used to merge the statistics into one file in order to post-process that data.

option.name: path to folder with FastQC Outputs

fullDescription.option: The node searches recursively all folders and sub-folders of the input directory for output files of a FastQC run.
Output files with the name of each selected module will be created there.

Modules for which the data should be merged must be selected here. At least one module must be selected.
Special modules:
- "Merge Status of all Modules": merges the status of all modules (pass, warn or fail are possible FastQC status values)
"Merge ALL Modules": selects or de-selects all modules

ports.outPort:
Cell 0: name of module
Cell 1: path to the merged file
Cell 0: path to the FastQC output files which were merged
